participant_1.background:
I've got a laptop to help me keep track of my gardening plans.
i love lasagna like i m garfield.
I like to watch talk shows and sitcoms while I drink my coffee.
I got injured while running and had to stop for a few weeks.
I'm not super close with my family, but I do enjoy spending time with them.

participant_2.background:
I want to show off my new earrings to my friends.
I'm proud of who I am, and I'm not going to let my vision impairment stop me from living my life to the fullest.
my ultimate dream , however , is to be a writer.
i drive a ford taurus.
i like to sing broadway show tunes.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
I am doing great! I just got a new pair of earrings and I want to show them off to my friends.
That sounds exciting! I love getting new jewelry. What kind are they?
They are these really pretty silver earrings with blue crystals. They are so sparkly!
Oh, those sound beautiful! I bet they look amazing on you.
What do you do for fun?
I love to sing broadway show tunes. I've been in a few musicals and I love performing.
That sounds like so much fun! I've never been in a musical, but I love to watch them.
You should totally try it! It's a lot of work, but it's also so much fun.
I might just have to do that!
You should! I'm sure you'd be great at it.
You're welcome! I'm always happy to talk about theater.
It's always nice to meet someone who shares the same interests.
